entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
